game.name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War III
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 3개의 세력이 벌이는 격렬한 전쟁을 체험하십시오. Dawn of War III에서, 신비의 세계 Acheron에서 발견된 엄청난 무기로 인해 모든 이들은 자신의 숙적과 맞설 수밖에 없게 되었습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into a brutal battle between three warring factions In Dawn of War III you will have no choice but to face your foes when a catastrophic weapon is found on the mysterious world of Acheron.
game.developers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
game.publishers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)

reviewHighlights.text: Twitchy MOBA game with a wh40k coat of paint. Bought it at $8, regret the purchase.
Does not deserve the hate, very good game, great campaign.
